Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-3652 affecting package libreswan for versions less than 4.15-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-3652 affecting package libreswan for versions less than 4.15-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package libreswan is earlier than 4.15-1, affected by CVE-2024-3652
